connector.description:
Add a new comment to an existing issue in Jira.

The Kamelet expects the following headers to be set:

- `issueKey` / `ce-issueKey`: as the issue code.

The comment is set in the body of the message.

camel.kamelet.jira-add-comment-sink.jira.name: camel.kamelet.jira-add-comment-sink.jiraUrl
camel.kamelet.jira-add-comment-sink.jira.description: The URL of your instance of Jira Example: http://my_jira.com:8081

camel.kamelet.jira-add-comment-sink.pass.name: camel.kamelet.jira-add-comment-sink.password
camel.kamelet.jira-add-comment-sink.pass.description: The password or the API Token to access Jira
